Reviews.Title: Battery was no good, would not take a charge!!
Reviews.Author: Bruce I.
Reviews.Content: received in good shape, but the battery was suppose to be in working condition but will not take a charge.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Gary Knotts
Reviews.Content: Minor problem with it being locked and blacklisted by Verizon,but fixed that for less than $5.00 and H2O Sim card,works perfectly for any GSM network now!Phone came well packed and in great condition and on time!

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: Sonequa H. Reeves "Buckeye Teach"
Reviews.Content: The phone did not work. I was unable to activate through my mobile provider. Seller was willing to replace it, but my mobile provider replaced it sooner.

Reviews.Title: Just ok I guess.
Reviews.Author: tanknitrous
Reviews.Content: I had planned to use this phone as my iPhone 5 was on the fritz. Just needed a holdover until I got something more to my liking. I had remembered really liking the old Bold, so I bought this. It was a little more beat up I think, than the seller had let on. I know this is subjective, but there was painting and chips on the keys, the battery was a little corroded. The phone DID work however. The trackpad was slightly off-kilter which did affect performance when having to sometimes press it 3 times to click on something. I used the phone for about 2 hours before deciding I'd have to do something else. My cell HAS to work. So, I bucked up and just got another iPhone. I don't really blame the seller.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Haiti4ever
Reviews.Content: I absolutely LOVE it!  The phone works very well, and I am very happy with it.  Professional and curteous seller.  Thanks so much! A+

Reviews.Title: IT'S OK
Reviews.Author: noel hobson
Reviews.Content: it was not open so i had to take it to someone to get it open. HHH HHH HHH HH HHH HHH
